name: The Exploration of Unity and the Universe
name_original: The Exploration of Unity and the Universe
description:
Arrow keys or WASD to move. Spacebar to jump. B, N, F, J, or T to shoot.

A platformer game completed in the Indie Game Academy Level 2 program taught by John Nelson Rose. This game was an opportunity for me to get familiar with various Unity functions and to practice game development. It's only a single level, and not a very good one at that, but it served its purpose in exercising my elementary Unity skills.
